Feng Liu

Postdoctoral Researcher
Computer Vision Lab, Department of Computer Science and Engineering
Michigan State University, East Lansing
Office: Room 3315, Engineering Building, MSU

I‚Äôm currently a postdoctoral researcher at Michigan State University, working under the guidance of Prof. Xiaoming Liu. I previously graduated with Ph. D. degree in Computer Science from Sichuan University where I was advised by Prof. Zhisheng You and Prof. Qijun Zhao.

I study 3D object/scene understanding, including 3D correspondence, detection and reconstruction. I am also interested in understanding explainability, generalization and controllability in generative models, such as GANs and Diffusion Models. In addition, I have a significant amount of experience in 3D face reconstruction, face recognition, and DeepFake detection.
